name: CAO - Gold Vintage - Cremant
additionalNotes: CAO Gold Vintage is among the prized achievements of the CAO Cigar Company. A classic from its inception, Gold Vintage is a premium, exceptionally smooth cigar blended for discriminating smokers in search of a medium-bodied cigar. A Honduran and Nicaraguan filler and binder blend sits beneath a heavily-aged Ecuadorian Connecticut wrapper. CAO Gold Vintage has it all, from exceptional flavor to velvety smoothness and ease of smoking.
